benchmark_details.name: FrJUDGE
benchmark_details.overview: FrJUDGE is a new dataset to assess legal meaning preservation between two legal texts, aimed at simplifying text while preserving its meaning specifically for the legal domain.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate automatic text simplification systems for legal texts based on legal meaning preservation.

data.source: Human-annotated sentences from French insurance legal documents.
data.annotation: Manually annotated by legal domain experts.

methodology.calculation: Legal meaning preservation measures how well the output text conveys the legal details and exceptions and does not misrepresent the law.
methodology.interpretation: Scores are based on a Likert scale from 1 to 10, where higher scores indicate better preservation of legal meaning.
methodology.validation: Scores were compared against human judgments and baseline metrics.
